code: import api from'./api';export const const availabilityAPI={getMySlots:()=>api.get('/availability/slots'),setSchedule:data=>api.post('/availability/schedule',data),deleteSlot:id=>api.delete("/availability/slots/".concat(id)),getAvailable:(professionalId,date)=>api.get("/availability/".concat(professionalId,"/available?date=").concat(date))};export
